title: (x) Lovely thin geometric "The Importance of Being Ernesto" - Fido {Marcus Piper}
content:
Hi folks-

Firstly thanks for your support over the while in helping me with my typography problems!  
Im really liking the beautiful typeface by Marcus Piper called FIDO, used as a headline font within POLOXYGEN. It seems this is not avaliable for purchase- Im wondering if there is something similar avaliable?

Thanks so much for your help!

Best from New Zealand!

Cheers

 [‹ Wanama logo slab serif / typewritter font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/typophile.com/node/38041 "Go to previous forum topic") [Federal Gov't letterhead/envelopes 1980 vintage ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/typophile.com/node/37936 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content:
How are we supposed to know what you are talking about?  
Please post a link or sample.

Sorry- thought posted graphic was uploaded, please check this out..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_6252.jpg)

I’m guessing it’s the big thin one here: [http://www.marcuspiper.com/index.php?s=work&id=&p=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/www.marcuspiper.com/index.php?s=work&id=&p=1 "http://www.marcuspiper.com/index.php?s=work&id=&p=1")

Check out [the August 27 FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/) for very thin alternatives, though you might not find anything quite this thin.

- Lex

Thanks Lex-  
Yip it’s the thin one; Ill try and post a better image, thanks for your help.

hey lex-

how do i get to the ’font feed’?  
Is it me on my MAC; but the search function rarely works on my safari??

Cheers

The FontFeed is FontShop’s blog/newsletter. You can subscribe at the FontShop site.

As for search, it’s best to do a Google search for “site:typophile.com your search terms here” since the search on Typophile doesn’t really work all that great.

- Lex

Links not working for you, JPC?

[http://www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/")

[Avant Gard Extra Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20071016160434/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_avant_garde_extra_light/?sample_text=THE%20IMPORTANCE&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) will get you close.

Hi Jason,

Yes it’s the thin one called FIDO which I developed early last year and ended up using in the redesign of Oxygen. As it is being used in Oxygen I can’t sell it on for a year... but that is almost up and there will be a version available. Get your order in I guess...

Marcus
